Detailed Description

DrmDcfParser - Class to parse and fetch decrypted media content from the DCF file. Also has helpers to get DCF header information

Member Enumeration Documentation

INT DrmDcfParser::GetBlockDataOffSet (  INT  block_num,
INT  block_sz,
INT &  new_block_sz
) 
 

Get the offset inthe dcf message for the given block

Parameters:
block_num should be greater than 1.
block_sz standard block size
new_block_sz This will be updated by this function. The value will remain same as block_sz execpt for the last block.
Returns:
Offset in DCF message or error code OR reached end error OR message parse error

BOOLEAN DrmDcfParser::GetDcfHeader (  DrmDcfHeader &  header  ) 
 

Get the all available DCF headers from the message and store in a vector, in name, value pair format.

Returns:
TRUE on successfull parsing
